name: gardevoirite
effect: Held: Allows Gardevoir to Mega Evolve into Mega Gardevoir.
short_effect: Held: Allows Gardevoir to Mega Evolve into Mega Gardevoir.

flavor_text.sword-shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Gardevoir hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
